H0.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. Karin Slaughter

H1.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. John Grisham

H2.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. James Patterson

H3.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. Blindsighted

A4.text: Slaughter's bestselling thriller series, Will Trent, is now a television series starring Ramón Rodríguez in the role of Will Trent and Erika Christensen as Angie.

A5.text: The Will Trent series, which takes place in Atlanta, Georgia, features Georgia Bureau of Investigation special agent Will Trent and his partner, Faith Mitchell.
